key_talking_points: The first period has started with a quick pace. Florida leads Edmonton 5-4.
Edmonton's Mattias Janmark won the opening faceoff against Florida's Anton Lundell.
Edmonton's Evan Bouchard missed a shot, ringing it off the crossbar just 11 seconds into the period.
A penalty was called on Edmonton's Cody Ceci for high-sticking Florida's Carter Verhaeghe. Florida goes to the power play with 19:23 remaining in the first period.
for_commentary_agent.context: The game has started with some intensity. Focus on the upcoming power play for Florida.

high_intensity_events.summary: Missed shot by Evan Bouchard (EDM) - hit crossbar
Penalty on Cody Ceci (EDM) for high-sticking

task_details.specific_guidance: Focus on the impact of the penalty on the game.
